fullDescription.intro: A leaky ReLU is a rectified linear unit (ReLU) with a slope in the negative part of its input space. The motivation for leaky ReLUs is that vanilla ReLUs have a gradient of zero in the negative part of their input space which can harm learning.
fullDescription.option: Slope in the negative part of the input space. Usually a small positive value. Setting alpha to 0.0 corresponds to a ReLU, setting alpha to 1.0 corresponds to the identity function.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Leaky ReLU layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Leaky ReLU layer.
